factText: Neighbors are still picking up the pieces after their homes were damaged in the Watson Grinding explosion on Friday. Displaced residents impacted by explosion sue Watson Grinding and Manufacturing facility for negligence. Homes near Watson Grinding explosion continue to crumble https://t.co/QgaEvf4J6m. Homes were blown off their foundations in the adjoining neighborhood, and the blast was reportedly felt over ten miles away.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q014

factText: The blast killed at least two workers, sent nearly 20 others to the hospital and damaged more than 200 homes in its vicinity, leaving a few dozen of them uninhabitable — including Hernandez’s."
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q005

factText: After last week’s deadly explosion, Mayor Turner said regulatory shortcomings are putting our safety at risk. If your home experienced damage during the deadly blast on Friday, be prepared when planning your repairs.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q024

factText: CJA is sending love and prayers to our Houston family, as we heard the news about the massive explosion in Northwest Houston with fatalities. Over the weekend we learned about another powerful industrial explosion in the Houston, Texas area. NEW VIDEO of Friday’s deadly explosion in NW Houston. Dramatic before and after photos show effects of west Houston explosion at manufacturing plant https://t.co/AtA0Eu4RVD via @houstonchron. Update on Houston explosion:
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_general_What news outlets are reporting on {event} and what are they saying?

factText: The powerful blast that killed Frank Flores and a co-worker also damaged 450 nearby homes and businesses. 15 Corvettes that were being restored are currently trapped inside two buildings destroyed by the recent Houston factory explosion. At least seven people were sent to hospitals suffering from exposure to the flames or the frigid water.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q008

factText: Scottsboro Fire Chief Gene Necklaus said eight people believed to be missing were confirmed dead.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q007

factText: Seven people were pulled from the water and treated for minor injuries, mainly for hypothermia from the cold water, he said.

factText: After the explosion in Houston on Friday, 16-year-old Reyna ran away.

factText: Explosion aftermath | Neighbors still recovering three days after blast | https://t.co/sKzkDsMC7S https://t.co/cgvU0Ap9Rs #Houston. Houston mayor, others help residents after deadly blast: Mayor Sylvester Turner on Saturday walked through the impacted neighborhoods in northwest Houston and spoke with residents who were cleaning up after Friday’s explosion. Houston homeowners pick up pieces of home, lives after explosion https://t.co/ehCZhVTBFX  via @HoustonChron

factText: Residents of northwest Houston remain shaken today, three days after a massive polypropylene explosion at Watson Grinding & Manufacturing tragically killed two people, injured 20 others, and inflicted heavy damage on homes and businesses throughout the surrounding neighborhoods. . In Texas, an explosion at an industrial plant early Friday morning killed two people and damaged over 200 homes northwest of Houston.

factText: The fallout from Friday's massive explosion in northwest Houston was even worse than originally thought.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_Accident_What caused the explosion during {event}?

factText: Houston Fire Dept reports 450 houses were damaged by Friday's massive fatal explosion at Watson Grinding and Manufacturing. New numbers from Friday's explosion that destroyed several homes show the extent of the blast heard all over the Houston area. 450 structures damaged in northwest Houston explosion last week, HFD says https://t.co/FPSuZ8J7l1. According to the Houston Fire Chief, roughly 450 buildings were damaged during Friday's deadly explosion.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_Accident_What buildings and infrastructure were destroyed in {event}?

factText: City now says 450 structures damaged in the Watson Grinding explosion. New assessment shows 450 structures damaged by Houston blast $TISI #TISI #Accidentsanddisasters #Corporatelawsuits #Corporatelegalaffairs --A. A total of 450 structures were damaged or destroyed by the blast at Watson Grinding. The new total is more than double the initial assessment of about 200 damaged structures after the explosion early Friday at a building at Watson Grinding and Manufacturing.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-General-q042

factText: #HoustonExplosion Update: The investigation into Friday’s West Houston Explosion is ongoing. The recent explosion in Houston has impacted many families who are now trying to deal with the aftermath of this devastating disaster. Dozens of Residents in northwest Houston, where a deadly explosion at a warehouse killed two people, are cleaning up. Units responding to a report of a HOUSE/STRUCTURE ON FIRE on Hill Rd            - in Houston. Thank you to @HoustonFire who responded to the scene.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_general_What actions are being taken by law enforcement to ensure safety during {event}?

factText: The Houston Police Department, Houston Fire Department, and the Mayor’s Office of Public Safety and Homeland Security, in coordination with the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF) Houston Division; Texas Commission on Environmental Quality (TCEQ); and Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) have launched a joint investigation into the cause of Friday’s explosion.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_Accident_What is the government response to {event}?

factText: New numbers from Friday's explosion in Houston show 450 structures were damaged. An explosion at a Houston industrial plant killed two people on Friday morning  https://t.co/nVdzophUU2. 2 killed, 20 injured when warehouse explosion shakes Houston READ MORE:. An updated assessment released Monday of the impact of a massive explosion at a warehouse in Houston that killed two workers and injured 20 others shows that 450 structures, mostly homes, were damaged.
informationNeeds: CrisisFACTS-010_Accident_How many casualties have been reported due to {event}?

factText: Officials say 35 of those structures have "major damage".
